decision_conditions:
<p>The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this
permission.&nbsp;<br></p>

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be constructed entirely of the materials details shown on drawings P108 / R03,&nbsp;P109 / R03,&nbsp;P110 / R03,&nbsp;P113 / R03 (Dated July 2021) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning
Authority and shall thereafter be retained as such for the lifetime of the development<br></p>

<p>The roof area of the development hereby approved shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or sitting out area at any
time<br></p>

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and thereafter
maintained as such for the lifetime of the development:</p><ul><li>Block Plan- P100 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>Site Location Plan (Undated)</li><li>EX01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX02 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX03 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX04 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX05 / R01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX06 / R01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX07 / R01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX08 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX09 / R01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>EX10 / R01 (Dated June 2021)</li><li>P101 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P102 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P103 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P104 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P105 / R01 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P106 / R01 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P107 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P108 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P109 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P110 / R03 (Dated July 2021)</li><li>P111 / R02 (Dated August&nbsp;2021)</li><li>P112 / R02 (Dated August 2021)</li><li>P113 / R03 (Dated July 2021)<br></li></ul>

Notwithstanding the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) or any Order revoking and/or re-enacting that Order, no additional windows shall be inserted in the elevations of the development/extension hereby permitted without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Construction of a two storey side extension at ground and first floor levels and single storey rear and side infill extension at ground floor level. Construction of refuse/recycling store and bicycle storey to front garden area.
